source:
# Import necessary libraries
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, current_timestamp, current_date
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
source_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Accomodation_Type_vw_delta'
target_delta_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Accomodation_Type_delta'

# Read source view
src_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_delta_path)

# Create a DeltaTable object for the target table
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_delta_path)

# Define merge and update conditions
merge_condition = """
    tgt.visitarchiveid = src.visitarchiveid AND
    tgt.IdOrder = src.IdOrder
"""

update_condition = """
    tgt.AccomodationTypeDesc <> src.AccomodationTypeDesc OR
    tgt.AccomodationDateAdded <> src.AccomodationDateAdded OR
    tgt.AccomodationTypeSNOMED <> src.AccomodationTypeSNOMED
"""

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("tgt")
 .merge(
    src_df.alias("src"),
    merge_condition
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition=update_condition,
    set={
        "AccomodationTypeDesc": "src.AccomodationTypeDesc",
        "AccomodationDateAdded": "src.AccomodationDateAdded",
        "AccomodationTypeSNOMED": "src.AccomodationTypeSNOMED",
        "AmendOn": current_timestamp()
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values={
        "visitarchiveid": "src.visitarchiveid",
        "IdOrder": "src.IdOrder",
        "AccomodationTypeDesc": "src.AccomodationTypeDesc",
        "AccomodationDateAdded": "src.AccomodationDateAdded",
        "AccomodationTypeSNOMED": "src.AccomodationTypeSNOMED",
        "AmendOn": current_timestamp()
    }
 )
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")
